sub_title: Global Head of Industry High Tech @ ServiceNow | Solving complex problems, on your terms
summary:
I have been working at high-tech companies for over 15 years, using my background in engineering to help people do more with technology. 

Colleagues describe me as an energetic leader with an agile mindset, and a big advocate of transparency, open communication, and continuous learning. Clients trust me to guide them through complex technology projects with confidence, as I understand the unique taxonomy, language, and pressures of the manufacturing sector. 

I’m also fascinated by the evolving trends of the industry, such as the drive for growth and innovation, shorter time to market, better security and risk management, and smarter supply chains. For me, the key to success across all of this - and the future for manufacturing as a whole - lies in augmenting people with technology.

projects.title: Strategic Workforce Development
projects.description: The objective is to develop with leading partners like GamingWorks, Accenture, DASA and others explore areas of collaboration to create (IT) transformational journeys. We are helping the organization accelerate the adoption of new technologies and ways of working. (IT) Engineers learn best by doing. We used gamification and bite size learning to propel an interactive learning experience using real, technology and infrastructure.

projects.title: Organize for Change
projects.description:
Digital Transformation program of NXP R&D IT. 

The R&D IT Organize for Change program is a transformation model towards a Digital Operating Model, in which long-term success through customer satisfaction
is achieved. In a Digital organization, all members participate
in improving processes, products, services and the culture in which they work.

The objective of Organize for Change is that all members of R&D IT participate in improving the processes, the products and the services they work with, while also improving the culture they work in. Ultimately, R&D IT will become a DevOps organization, collaborating with its business stakeholders and other key players.

profile_positions.description:
•	Engaging with executive leaders across the manufacturing sector to understand complex challenges
•	Collaborating with industry partners to develop new solutions and address emerging trends
•	Helping customers identify and overcome internal barriers to the adoption of new technology
•	Providing ongoing support, advice, and guidance to customers, and helping them drive maximum value from their investments
profile_positions.title: Global Head of Manufacturing High Tech

profile_positions.description: Through our Industry team we build deep and trusted relationships with our customers, partners and industry communities across the world. Aligned with our GTM and Product teams. As Industry lead I’m responsible for delivering thought leadership and supporting our customers to make critical business decisions as they accelerate their business with ServiceNow.
profile_positions.title: Head of Manufacturing EMEA

profile_positions.description:
The AI Innovation Center is an open innovation facility founded by High Tech Campus Eindhoven, Philips, Signify, ASML and NXP. Our mission is to industrialize Artificial Intelligence technologies in the bigger Brainport Eindhoven region.

To achieve this mission, the AI Innovation Center brings together technology companies, platform & service providers, research & educational institutes and other relevant ecosystem partners in a shared facility.

In this hub, located in the heart of Europe’s smartest square kilometer, partners work together on challenges, share knowledge and accelerate AI applications in an open innovation environment.
profile_positions.title: Innovation and Business Manager

profile_positions.description:
We help organizations across the private, public, and social sectors create the “Change that Matters” most to them. From the C-suite to the front line, we truly partner with our clients to transform their organizations, embed technology into everything they do, and build enduring capabilities.

All transformations requires to rethink how to create value today and in the future. In other words, all transformations requires to think big. Incremental improvement is not enough to win in today’s exponentially disrupted business environment. Organization requires sustainable growth in the face of near constant disruption, and sustained growth requires agile reinvention. 

Any digital transformation comes with opportunities, learnings and challenges. The aim of Communicon is to deepen knowledge related to Digital Transformation and Change Management. The exchange of knowledge supports developing the required skills and competences, while sharing practices will make digital transformation efforts more effective.
profile_positions.title: Owner Communicon

profile_positions.description:
Sebastiaan's primary driver at Splunk has been to enable the C-Suite on the power of data, the different use cases and value to get out your data. He is a trusted advisor to customers. He is always looking for new ways to prove value and transform the industry for the better.

Splunk is the leading software platform for machine data that enables customers to gain real-time Operational Intelligence. Our company's mission is to address the challenges and opportunities of managing massive streams of machine-generated big data. More than half of the Fortune 100 and thousands of enterprises, universities, government agencies and service providers use Splunk software to harness the power of their machine data for application management, IT operations, security, web intelligence, customer and business analytics and more.
profile_positions.title: Chief Transformation Officer

profile_positions.description:
Throughout my 15+ year career I have focused on helping organizations getting more value out of IT. Often this has not much to do with changing or investing in technology. It is almost always primarily about culture, leadership, and organizational transformation. In my view, in these disruptive times, digital-driven innovation and organizational transformation is urgent and a necessity for organizations to survive.

I am passionate about building High-Performance Digital Organizations. I strive to make as much positive impact as possible by giving lectures and trainings, via coaching and consulting, and by taking (ad interim) leadership and sr. management positions. I am committed to actively build a community or practice of leaders and experts in order to create a body of knowledge around digital/organizational transformation and digital leadership
profile_positions.title: Digital Transformation Manager

profile_positions.description:
Ziggo is the largest cable television operator in the Netherlands. Ziggo offers video, broadband internet, and fixed-line telephony (VoIP) to 9.7 million service subscribers (RGUs) represented by 4.0 million customers as of September 30, 2016. It also offers mobile voice and data services.

Ziggo customers are located throughout the Netherlands, including the major cities of Amsterdam, Rotterdam, The Hague, Utrecht, and Maastricht. All of its networks are upgraded to two-way capability, and all of its cable homes are served by a network with a bandwidth of at least 860 MHz.
Ziggo also offers a range of video, broadband internet, voice, and data services to business customers and wholesale partners.
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Architect

profile_positions.description: Snow B.V. is a temporary work agency for IT engineers and consultants with a strong focus on the nice market in IT. Within Snow I developed myself as the leading consultant in the system management and integration area, participating in the sharing of knowledge within the company, which served as a horizon broadening of many colleagues. For Snow B.V. I was placed with several employers. Next to being placed as consultant I acted as account manager to support the sales team. I participated in the development of new business for example, Managed Competences to deliver a broader scope of services toward customer.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
T-Systems is a German global IT services and consulting company headquartered in Frankfurt. Founded in 2000, it is a subsidiary of Deutsche Telekom.

As of 2012, T-Systems was the largest German and one of the largest European IT services companies, serving customers such as WestLB, Old Mutual, Daimler, Volkswagen, Royal Dutch Shell, Sanlam, Murray & Roberts, BP, TUI AG, De Agostini, Philips, MAN SE, Airbus, E.ON. and British American Tobacco. The company operates in more than 20 countries and in 2015 employed 45,990
